ToolProficiencyFeature.Name: Sea Elf Weapon Training
ToolProficiencyFeature.Text: You have proficiency with the spear, trident, light crossbow, and net.

Feature.Name: Child of the Sea
Feature.Text: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet, and you can breathe air and water.

Feature.Name: Friend of the Sea
Feature.Text: Using gestures and sounds, you can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts that have an innate swimming speed.

LanguageProficiencyFeature.Name: Languages
LanguageProficiencyFeature.Text: You can speak, read, and write Aquan.

Description.Name: Sea Elf Traits
Description.Text: Sea elves have the following traits in common, in addition to the traits they share with other elves.

SubRace.Name: Sea Elf
SubRace.Description: The sea elves fell in love with the wild beauty of the ocean in the earliest days of the multiverse. While other elves traveled from realm to realm, the sea elves navigated the deepest currents and explored the waters across a hundred worlds. Today, they form small, hidden communities in the ocean shallows and the Elemental Plane of Water.
